name: shared-requirejs-webpack
description: Build experiments for shared common libs in RequireJS, Webpack

scripts.wp-build: npm run wp-clean && npm run wp-build-lib && npm run wp-build-lib-min && npm run wp-build-app && npm run wp-build-app-min
scripts.rjs-build-app: r.js -o requirejs.build.js && cp build/requirejs/lib.js build/requirejs/app.js dist/requirejs
scripts.rjs-build-min-app: r.js -o requirejs.build.min.js && cp build/requirejs-min/lib.min.js build/requirejs-min/app.min.js dist/requirejs
scripts.rjs-build: npm run rjs-clean && npm run rjs-build-almond && npm run rjs-build-app && npm run rjs-build-min-almond && npm run rjs-build-min-app
scripts.rp-build: npm run rp-clean && node lib/requirepack.js > dist/requirepack.js
scripts.build: npm run wp-build && npm run rjs-build && npm run rp-build
scripts.lint: npm run lint-client && npm run lint-server
